name: LIGHT - v1.01
description:
Do you have what it  takes to survive the darkness? If your answer is yes have a go at our brand new game called 'LIGHT' . Your goal is to enter the main gates.. How do you do that? You have to find out yourself :P  Game was made in about 2.5 days so quality content only.  

---------------------------------------------

What's new in update 1.01:

-New map with new textures. 

-Fixed light leaks on the floor. 

-Added main menu / pause menu system. 

-Removed running option. 

-Added loading screen. 

-Other small bug fixes. 

--------------------------------------------

Controlls: 

Movement: W/A/S/D or Arrow keys

Open map: Hold (Right mouse button / ALT Button)

Interact with levers: E or Left mouse button

Pause menu: ESC (Escape key)

The team: 

Leader / 3D Designer: Rokas Zilinskas (Rokunas) 

Programmers:  Oliver van Velzen (Ovv)  & Alexey Shmakov (Razzeeyy)

Sound Design: Kasper Larson (FieryPenguin)

2D / UI Artist: David Karuza (MokanD)
